channel.title: Exhibitions on Dragana Radanovic
channel.description: Recent content in Exhibitions on Dragana Radanovic

item.title: LUCA Show 2019
item.description: LUCA School of Arts - Sint-Lukas Brussel presents: 𝗚𝗥𝗔𝗗𝗨𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡 𝗦𝗛𝗢𝗪 𝟮𝟬𝟭𝟵 27.06-29.06 All the graduated master students of Visual Arts & Audiovisual Arts, the graduated bachelor students of Interior Design and a selection of 3 bachelor students Visual Arts are showing their work on campus in order to offer a broad overview of the hard work that students finalize at the end of the academic year.
